#thinking in ECMAScript 4.

= We are Hybrid =

ES4 or AS3 is not Java nor C#, sure we can borrow principle and recipes from other languages but we have to keep thinking in ECMAScript.

You see often the opposition of class-based programming vs prototype-based programming,
but with ES4 you can do both, you can do what I call Hybrid programming and this is very powerfull.

This page will list some point of view, approach, etc. on common code organization, code design, etc.
